cancel.title: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. After cancellation, you can still use the service until the end of your current billing period.

payment.title: What payment methods do you support?
payment.answer: We support all major credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallet payments.

generation.title: How long does video generation take?
generation.answer: Typically, 5-30 second videos take 1-3 minutes to generate, depending on the complexity of the video.

api.title: Do you provide API access?
api.answer: Yes! Teams plan customers get full REST API access. Solo plan includes standard features without API access.
